price: Bemeramana! Ntimugacike inkokora ngo mutinye guhangana n’ababangikanyamana ku rugamba, mubararikira kwishikana kandi ari mwebwe benintsinzi mushoboye no kubanesha; burya Imana Allah, Iri kumwe na mwe mu kubatera intege, kandi ntizogabanya indishi ku vyo mwakoze.
arabic: فَلَا تَهِنُواْ وَتَدۡعُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلسَّلۡمِ وَأَنتُمُ ٱلۡأَعۡلَوۡنَ وَٱللَّهُ مَعَكُمۡ وَلَن يَتِرَكُمۡ أَعۡمَٰلَكُمۡ

meta.transliteration: falā tahinū watadʿū ilā al-salmi wa-antumu al-aʿlawna wal-lahu maʿakum walan yatirakum aʿmālakum
